title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API with sync & async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM & chat interfaces.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama WebUI Community Fork)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-user support, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j – Java Client for Ollama
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code Extension
summary: VS Code extension that hooks Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane for local AI coding assistance.

title: ollama-rag – CLI RAG Tool
summary: Lightweight Python CLI to build retrieval-augmented generation pipelines over local documents using Ollama embeddings & LLMs.

title: ollama-cli – Rust TUI Client
summary: Fast Rust TUI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-haystack – Haystack Integration
summary: Haystack custom component letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord – Discord Bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel via slash commands.

title: ollama-n8n – n8n Community Node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET SDK
summary: Unofficial C# SDK targeting .NET 8 with async streaming and dependency-injection friendly client.

title: ollama-helm – Kubernetes Helm Chart
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama (with GPU support) on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-dagger – Dagger Module
summary: Reusable Dagger module for spinning up Ollama services in CI pipelines to test LLM integrations.

title: ollama-rust – Rust Crate
summary: Async Rust client library for Ollama; available on crates.io as ‘ollama-rs’.

title: ollama-camunda – Camunda Connector
summary: Community Camunda 8 outbound connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes.

title: ollama-elixir – Elixir Client
summary: Unofficial Elixir wrapper with GenServer behaviour and streaming support; Hex package ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-obsidian – Obsidian Plugin
summary: Experimental Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summaries and Q&A on your vault notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack – Slack Bolt App
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models inside Slack workspaces.
